clinical_study.brief_title: Metformin Plus Megestrol Acetate as a Fertility-sparing Treatment in Patients With Atypical Endometrial Hyperplasia
clinical_study.official_title: Comparing Metformin Plus Megestrol Acetate With Megestrol Acetate Alone as a Fertility-sparing Treatment in Patients With Atypical Endometrial Hyperplasia

brief_summary.textblock: To verify whether metformin could improve the effect of progestin as fertility-sparing treatment in patients with atypical endometrial hyperplasia(AEH).

detailed_description.textblock: Whether metformin could improve the effect of progestin as fertility-sparing treatment in patients with atypical endometrial hyperplasia(AEH) is still not clear. Our previous finding from subgroup analysis in a phase II randomized controlled trial showed that 39.6% of AEH patients in metformin plus megestrol acetate group achieved complete response, compared with 20.4% in group of megestrol acetate alone. This trial aim to fully testify the effect of metformin in fertility-sparing treatment for AEH patients with adequate sample size.
